case.title: Plans fell through tonight...looking to hang with a spontaneous woman. - 28 (Brooklyn)
case.text:
I know it's weird that this is Craigslist and all, but just laying low tonight...
Are you looking for something to do? My plans fell through for this evening, so here I am putting faith out there that there is someone in the same boat. I'm open to suggestions.
Coffee, twister, dinner, cuddling, a movie...I can host too.
I'm laid back, attractive, fun, and easy to get along with.
If you're cute, affectionate, and intelligent, the floor is yours.
